segments.text: I can't take my eyes off that sink; the water is just pouring out.

segments.text: The faucet is completely open, and the drain is obviously blocked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A steady sheet of water is cascading over the front of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's running down the cabinet doors, forming a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer amount of water pooling is quite shocking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only imagine the damage this will do to the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels so wasteful to see all that water just running freely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of it makes me a bit disgusted, honestly, with the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is definitely going to require a big cleanup effort.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to be very unhappy when they discover this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing there is completely oblivious to the flood around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just polishing a plate, lost in thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a simple fix, just turning off the tap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it's going unnoticed, and the situation is getting worse.

segments.text: This kitchen will be quite a disaster area soon.
